tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"巫毒箭","italic": false}',Lore:['{"text":"命中时对目标造成长时间的凋零效果。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"未命中时在箭矢落地之处散出一大片毒沼，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"使毒沼中的生物中毒。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"25 秒 (白昼) /","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"},{"text":" 15 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 查看详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
